text: Lightning Speed is a 1928 American action film directed by Robert N. Bradbury and starring Bob Steele, Mary Mayberry and Barney Furey.Munden p.436 ==Synopsis== A journalist in love with the daughter of a state governor tries to prevent her being kidnapped by a notorious criminal, who plansto force her father to pardon his brother. ==Cast== * Bob Steele as Jack * Mary Mayberry as Betty * Perry Murdock as Shorty * Barney Furey as Velvet * William Welsh as Governor ==References== ==Bibliography== * Munden, Kenneth White.
